name: basictable
description: Basic Table jQuery and Vanilla JS plugin for simple responsive tables with Tailwind CSS and Preline UI support.

scripts.compile-js: terser src/js/basictable.js --output dist/js/basictable.min.js -c -m --comments && terser src/js/basictable.js --output dist/js/basictable.js -b indent_level=2
scripts.compile-jquery: terser src/js/jquery.basictable.js --output dist/js/jquery.basictable.min.js -c -m --comments && terser src/js/jquery.basictable.js --output dist/js/jquery.basictable.js -b indent_level=2
scripts.compile-css: uglifycss src/css/basictable.css > dist/css/basictable.min.css --ugly-comments && beautify-css src/css/basictable.css dist/css/basictable.css
scripts.compile: yarn compile-js && yarn compile-jquery && yarn compile-css && yarn build-tailwind-min

author: jerrylow
